body.p: This provides the stats from AUX dispatcher and non-IO dispatcher, and from all the reader and writer threads running for the specific bucket. Along with stats, the job logs for each of the dispatchers and worker threads is also made available.
The following stats are available for the workers and dispatchers:

row.entry: Threadsâ€™s current status: running, sleeping etc.
The amount of time since the thread started running
The activity/job the thread is involved with at the moment

body.p: The following stats are for individual job logs:

row.entry: The timestamp when the job started
Time it took for the job to run
The activity/job the thread ran during that time
